#include<stdio.h>
#define L 100002
int palin[1100],k=0;
inline int memoize()
{
       int i,s,temp;
       for(i=0;i<L;++i)
       {
       temp=i;
       s=0;
       while(temp>0)
       {
       s=(s*10)+temp%10;
       temp/=10;
       }
       if(s==i)
       palin[k++]=s;
       }}
       

inline int bin_search(int num)
{
       int mid,low=0,high=k-1;
       while(low<=high)
       {
                       mid=(low+high)/2;
                       if(num==palin[mid])
                       return mid;
                       if(num>palin[mid] && num<palin[mid+1])
                       return mid+1;
                       if(num>palin[mid])
                       low=mid+1;
                       else
                       high=mid-1;
                       }
                       return 0;
                       }
       
int main()
{
    memoize();
    //printf("%d",k);
    //for(int i=0;i<k;++i)
    //printf("%d ",palin[i]);
    int tt,n;
    scanf("%d",&tt);
    while(tt--)
    {
               scanf("%d",&n);
               printf("%d\n",palin[bin_search(n)]);
               }
               return 0;
               }
